ComicInfo.Title: Letting Go!
ComicInfo.Summary:
As Chase begins his hunt to find the mysterious Incarnate and the Barbarian, the White Lotus takes steps to stop him dead in his tracks...30,000 feet in the air!
Meanwhile, the Incarnate shows just why Necrodyne wants him so badly as a test subject and the Barbarian begins to wonder who's in need of being rescued.
Also, Malig returns with a mysterious message.
Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-03-25 01:01:36. [CVDB138400]
https://comicvine.gamespot.com/manhunter-7-letting-go/4000-138400/
